note.text: Left arm wrist joint inflamed overnight after fall on 14/06/2022.
Frequent tearing of eyes, especially during day time.
Patients noticed droopy eyelids last week. Eyelids normal.
Always get a swelling of the toe on either feet during a gout attack.
